name: A Planet's End
description:
A Planet's End is a simple god game in which you have to create trees and beings on your planet, and to create humans to harvest new resources. The more resources you have harvested, the more you increase your score. You have nearly 5 minutes to do the best score. At the end of the 5 minutes, a meteor will destroy the planet. Be careful, monsters can appear to destroy your trees and beings.

I made a short tutorial because the game isn't really easy to understand in the first place.
